venue.address_1: 275 Valley Service Road, North Haven, Connecticut 06473
venue.name: The Only Game in Town

item.description:
Come enjoy the nice weather at "The only Game in Town", home of mini-golf, an arcade, go-karts, batting cages, a driving range, and bankshot basketball.
They have an 18-hole course with waterfalls and sandtraps, that you can play for $7.50, as well as their brand new 9-hole prehistoric course for $5.50. But if we get eight people or more, its 20% off!
Scenic shots of their course, other fun stuff there, and package rates for activities, and directions are available at their site:

http://www.theonlygam...

Meet at 3 by the mini-golf booth. See you Sunday!
-Neil
203-645-2008
item.name: Mini Golf is what really killed the dinosaurs
